name: EcoMarket
description:
EcoMarket

Money can’t buy happiness, but ecology can buy you a brighter future.

Collect EcoPoints while going shopping for your mum to reduce the amount of plastic in our oceans and make her proud!

Just be careful: it’s not so easy as you might think.

Money can't buy happiness, but ecology can make your future brighter.

Choose recyclable packaging like cardboard containers, reuse glass bottles while going shopping and collect EcoPoints. Let's reduce the amount of plastic in our oceans to make mommy proud!

P.s. Just be careful to stick to your budget.

Game available in English only.

Project made in Unity developed by Pietro Civalleri, Elisa Li Causi, Dalila Pasquali and Simone Segalini. Project made in Politecnico di Torino in course of Realtà Virtuale (Virtual Reality)
